Caption: Union Minister for Education Shri M.C. Chagla gives away the Siemens prize to Mr. Kanianthra Mani Chandy. Chandy went on to do his Masters from New York University and PhD from Massachusetts Institute of Technology. He served in the field of academics for over 40 years, having won several awards in the field and also from the University of Texas and Caltech. He was given the distinguished Alumnus Award from IIT-Madras in 2019.
